directions: Combine watermelon, strawberries, peaches, nectarines, pear, and grapes in a large mixing bowl.
Whisk lemon juice, mint, lemon zest, and honey together in a small bowl; drizzle over the fruit mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: 2 large fresh peaches, cut into cubes
1 red Anjou pear, cut into cubes
1/4 cup minced fresh mint (chocolate mint preferred)
title: Summer Fruit Salad with a Lemon, Honey, and Mint Dressing
